address.aria-label: Address for Reardan-Edwall School District Phone: 509-796-2701

span.data-emptytext: Reardan-Edwall School District Phone: 509-796-2701 provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
Nondiscrimination Notification
The Reardan-Edwall School District does not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, national origin, disability, or age in its program or activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The School District offers classes in many career and technical education program areas under its open admissions policy. For more information about CTE course offerings and admissions criteria, contact Mr. Marcus Morgan, Superintendent, 116 S. Lake Street, PO Box 225, Reardan, WA 99029, (509) 796-2701, extension 124. Lack of English language proficiency will not be a barrier to admission and participation in career and technical education programs. The following people have been designated to handle inquiries regarding the nondiscrimination policies:
Title IX Coordinator Eric Nikkola, Athletic Director 215 E Spokane Avenue PO Box 225 Reardan, WA 99029 (509) 796-2701, ext. 332 enikkola@reardansd.net
Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator/Section 504/ADA Coordinator Marcus Morgan, Superintendent 116 S Lake Street, PO Box 225 Reardan, WA 99029 (509) 796-2701, ext. 124 mmorgan@reardansd.net

p.span:
Nondiscrimination Notification
The Reardan-Edwall School District does not discriminate on the basis of sex, race, color, national origin, disability, or age in its program or activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The School District offers classes in many career and technical education program areas under its open admissions policy. For more information about CTE course offerings and admissions criteria, contact Mr. Marcus Morgan, Superintendent, 116 S. Lake Street, PO Box 225, Reardan, WA 99029, (509) 796-2701, extension 124. Lack of English language proficiency will not be a barrier to admission and participation in career and technical education programs. The following people have been designated to handle inquiries regarding the nondiscrimination policies:
Title IX Coordinator Eric Nikkola, Athletic Director 215 E Spokane Avenue PO Box 225 Reardan, WA 99029 (509) 796-2701, ext. 332 enikkola@reardansd.net
Civil Rights Compliance Coordinator/Section 504/ADA Coordinator Marcus Morgan, Superintendent 116 S Lake Street, PO Box 225 Reardan, WA 99029 (509) 796-2701, ext. 124 mmorgan@reardansd.net

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
